com.hotmail.kalebmarc

Class Tag

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hotmail.kalebmarc.jtools.Tag

  • public class Tag
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for Logger A Tag goes in front of a log in the format [tag_example], in a real-life scenario, it looks something like this: [warning] JVM is low on memory while "warning" is the tag, and "JVM is low on memory" being the message.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Detail

      • setTagText

        public void setTagText(java.lang.String text)
        Sets the text of the tag
        Parameters:
        text - The text that you want to be displayed in the Tag

      • getTagText

        public java.lang.String getTagText()
        Gets the text of the tag
        Returns:
        Text the tag is currently set to display

      • setUpperCase

        public void setUpperCase(boolean isUpperCase)
        Sets whether the tag is to be displayed in full caps or not. If the tag text is "Example", and setUpperCase is set to true, then it will be displayed as "EXAMPLE" when used.

      • isUpperCaseEnabled

        public boolean isUpperCaseEnabled()
        Gets whether setUpperCase is enabled or not
        Returns:
        true if the tag is set to be displayed in full Upper Case

      • get

        protected java.lang.String get()
        Gets the formatted tag
        Returns:
        the formatted tag
